creator: achmedlam@gmail.com
text:
Is it possible to get a copy of the bugzilla sql database of the apache http server? 
I am studying computer science at the university of Antwerp, Belgium. I am currently doing my master thesis where I research whether it is possible to automatically classify a bug report according its severity of the bug. This should help bug-triagers in classifying a bug.
I will use several text data mining techniques and therefore I need access to
a real bug database.
Please sent your request to infrastructure@apache.org.
creator: rpluem@apache.org
